text:
@carolecadwalla Trace: “Hi Track and Trace here”
Me: How do I know?
Trace: “what? I’m from the NHS you’ve been in contact with someone one with Covid19”
Me: Prove it? Could be a scam!
Trace: “it’s not a scam, we are tracking you’re phone”
Me: What’s your Mother’s Maiden Name
Etc, etc

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court
